name: Federally funded programs; exemption
text: [§432G-18]  Federally funded programs; exemption.  Requirements provided in this chapter relating to mandated coverages or essential health benefits shall not be applicable to any dental insurer offering dental insurance under a federally funded program under the Social Security Act, as amended; provided that this exemption shall apply only to that part of the dental insurer's business under the federally funded program. [L 2013, c 191, pt of §1]
